items.sentence: You\'ve been to Boston before, haven\'t you?
Tom should\'ve invited Mary, but he didn\'t.
It takes over 40 minutes to boil an emu egg.
It was you that suggested seeing that movie.
Your behavior is creating a lot of problems.
Your wife is going to ask you for a divorce.
I\'m glad it\'s not coming out of my pocket.
Tom quit his job to travel around the world.
Tom said he had plenty of friends in Boston.
Tom says he has enough money to buy a house.
My apartment is more comfortable than yours.
My grandfather is five times as old as I am.
I don\'t think I can swim across this river.
I don\'t think you should go there with Tom.
I don\'t usually eat lunch until about 2:30.
I don\'t want Tom to go to Boston with Mary.
What was the real reason for Tom\'s refusal?
Tom is so quiet you never know he\'s around.
I don\'t know what I\'ll do after Christmas.
It\'s raining, so please take your umbrella.
I go back home to Boston every three months.
I got a letter from an old friend yesterday.
I got tired of listening to Tom complaining.
I hate carrots even more than I hate onions.
I have a client waiting in the waiting room.
I have a deposit of a thousand dollars here.
Tom doesn\'t know where Mary graduated from.
Tom said he\'d love to go to Boston with us.
Tom said he\'d meet us in the lobby at 2:30.
I don\'t have time for a vacation this year.
I don\'t know Tom well, but I know his wife.
I don\'t know for certain when he will come.
I don\'t know how to reply to that question.
I don\'t know if I can ever trust you again.
I\'ll bet you that you\'re wrong about that.
You and I both know that Tom won\'t do that.
You can\'t expect Tom to get well overnight.
My speeches are all written by other people.
My uncle has a flower shop near the station.
I\'m sorry I can\'t help you now. I\'m busy.
You\'ll feel better after you eat something.
You\'ll get better at it the more you do it.
You\'ll never guess what I saw this morning.
You\'re a good father, no question about it.
You\'re not worried about the test, are you?
Could you translate this into French for me?
Cows are considered sacred animals in India.
Did you eat eggs for breakfast this morning?
Did you like the movie we watched yesterday?
Did you notice anything out of the ordinary?
